description: Europe eyes America's June jobs report. A new bridge between San Francisco and Oakland is set to open on Labor Day. And how the Tour de France plans to keep us watching after Lance Armstrong.
byline: Bruce Johnson, D Gorenstein, Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Christopher Werth, Isabel Angell, Julia Coronado, Sam Beard, Chris Farrell, Scott Tong and David Brancaccio
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, July 5, 2013
teaser: Europe eyes America's June jobs report. A new bridge between San Francisco and Oakland is set to open on Labor Day. And how the Tour de France plans to keep us watching after Lance Armstrong.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, July 5, 2013
